name: DeMarker Indicator Signal Analysis
question: Which stocks are showing DeMarker indicator overbought or oversold signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks are at extreme price levels?
description: Analyzes DeMarker indicator to identify price exhaustion points through overbought readings above 0.7 and oversold readings below 0.3. Examines demand pressure and supply pressure to predict potential reversal zones in trending markets.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for DeMarker indicator screening
Step 2: Get historical price data for DeMarker calculation and exhaustion analysis
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for DeMarker reversal opportunities
Step 4: Calculate DeMarker indicator and identify overbought/oversold extremes with reversal signals
Step 5: Rank DeMarker signals by extremity and mean reversion probability
